availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Garrard County, Kentucky farmer and politician. Kentucky native. Married Eliza Denny. Served in the Senate of the Kentucky General Assembly from 1859 to 1863.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, Division 1, p. 258. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, p. 18. “George Denny, Jr (1825-1897),” Find A Grave, memorial no. 44043556, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=44043556&ref=acom (accessed July 12, 2017). Lewis Collins and Richard H. Collins, History of Kentucky, Volume II (Covington, KY: Collins and Company, 1878), p. 288.
